DOC.brief_title: Cetuximab Induction Treatment Head Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma ( HNSCC )
DOC.criteria: Unresectable , locally advanced ( cT4b & /or cN23 ) HNSCC ECOG performance status 01 Age 18 old 18 year Measurable disease RECIST criterion Having sign informed consent ALT AST < 2.5 time ULN Serum albumin level ≥3.0g/dL Serum AKP < 2.5 time ULN Bilirubin level < 1.5mg/dL Serum creatinine < 1.5 time ULN WBC > 3000/mm3 , absolute neutrophil count ≥1500/mm3 , platelet > 75,000/mm3 , Hb > 9g/dl Previous cytotoxic chemotherapy HNSCC Radiotherapy target lesion within six month Previous EGFR pathwaytargeting therapy Prior surgery cancer ( exclude diagnostic biopsy within 4 week prior study entry ) Distant metastatic disease Heart failure , coronary artery disease , myocardial infarction within last 6 month Known allergy study treatment Pregnancy lactation period Any investigational agent within past 28 day Other previous malignancy within 5 year , except adequately treat situ cervical cancer , nonmelanoma skin cancer Legal incapacity
